title: Here's a list of 20 articles on the interpretability of NLP models up to 2020. These papers cover a range of topics, including model interpretability, explainability, and analysis techniques
**"Attention is not Explanation"** by Jain
**"Interpretable and Explainable Deep Learning: A Survey"** by Zhang, Qiang, and Yuyao Zhu
**"A Survey of Methods for Explaining Black Box Models"** by Guidotti, Riccardo, et al
Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations"** by Ribeiro, Marco Tulio, Sameer Singh, and Carlos Guestrin
**"Anchors: High-Precision Model-Agnostic Explanations"** by Ribeiro, Marco Tulio, Sameer Singh, and Carlos Guestrin
**"Visualizing and Understanding Neural Models in NLP"** by Li, Jiwei, et al
**"Evaluating and Enhancing the Robustness of Neural Network-based Dependency Parsers"** by Belinkov
**"Interpretability Beyond Feature Attribution: Quantitative Testing with Concept Activation Vectors (TCAV)"** by Kim, Been, et al
**"A Unified Approach to Interpreting Model Predictions"** by Lundberg
**"The Building Blocks of Interpretability"** by Lipton
**"Explaining Explanations: An Overview of Interpretability of Machine Learning"** by Gilpin
**"Towards a Rigorous Science of Interpretable Machine Learning"** by Doshi-Velez, Finale, and Been Kim
**"Learning Important Features Through Propagating Activation Differences"** by Shrikumar, Avanti, Peyton Greenside, and Anshul Kundaje
**"Interpretability of Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Montavon
- While not solely about interpretability, it introduces the attention mechanism, which is often discussed in interpretability contexts
Learning Important Features Through Propagating Activation Differences"** by Shrikumar, Avanti, et al
**"Understanding Black-box Predictions via Influence Functions"** by Koh
**"Interpretability of Machine Learning Models for Healthcare"** by Caruana, Rich, et al
note: - Focuses on healthcare but provides insights into interpretability.

title: These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the field and cover various methods and approaches to understanding and interpreting NLP models
